name: Yuanni
passiveDesc:
Yuanni manipulates "Stars" and "Moon", where "Stars" deals additional 20% Physical ATK and "Moon" deals additional 25% Magic PWR. If Yuanni has a Shield, "Moon"-aligned attacks are converted into Frost DMG.

Yuanni's attacks ignore all opponent's Shields. If the opponent has a Shield, her "Moon"-aligned attacks will deal additional 8% opponent's Shield and absorbs the same amount as her own Shield, capped at 75% Yuanni's Max HP.

If Yuanni has a Shield, she will apply a Shield equals to 140% of her Frost DMG dealt.
rTalentDesc: Yuanni's Normal and Charged Attacks accumulate 2 Echo Memories and 5 Energy. Dealing Disorder DMG accumulates 1 Echo Memory and 10 Energy.
normalAttackDesc: Yuanni's Normal Attacks deals two instance of DMG: Starbless and Moonbless. Starbless: Deals 20% Physical ATK as "Stars"-aligned Physical DMG. Moonbless: Deals 20 (+15% Magic PWR) as "Moon"-aligned Magic DMG.
chargedAttackDesc: Yuanni channels her "Stars" and "Moon" energy together, dealing 14 (+8% Physical ATK) (+12% Magic PWR) as Magic DMG. If Yuanni has a Shield, the aforementioned effects are increased by 100%, and converted into Frost DMG.
normalSkillDesc:
Yuanni obtains a Shield equals to 1.6% Max HP.

[5EM] Yuanni obtains a Shield equals to 3% Max HP and increases her Magic PWR by 6% for 1 Cycle.

[10EM] Yuanni obtains a Shield equals to 8% Max HP and increases her Magic PWR by 12% for 2 Cycles.

[15EM] Yuanni obtains a Shield equals to 16% Max HP and increases her Magic PWR by 12% for 2 Cycles. Yuanni will gains an extra action after casting this skill.

[20EM] Yuanni obtains a Shield equals to 20% Max HP and increases her Magic PWR by 12% for 2 Cycles. Yuanni will gains an extra action after casting this skill. Yuanni's Shield cap is increased by 25%.
riftedSkillDesc: Yuanni wishes upon the Stars, absorbing all her Shields and dealing 97 (+197% Magic PWR) (+4% Absorbed Shields) as Frost DMG, while healing herself by 24% Absorbed Shield.
fragment1Desc: Yuanni converts 4% of her Shield into her HP each round.
fragment2Desc: Yuanni's "Moon"-aligned attacks will deal additional 12% opponent's Shield and absorbs the same amount as her own Shield, capped at 125% Yuanni's Max HP.
fragment3Desc: "Guidance of Stars" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: When dealing Physical DMG, CRIT Rate is increased by 20% and CRIT DMG is increased by 70% for the next instance of DMG.
fragment6Desc:
All "Moon"-aligned attacks are converted into Frost DMG. When dealing Frost DMG to an opponent, apply the opponent with 1 stack Frostmoon for 2 Cycles, max 4 stacks.
Frostmoon: Increases Frost DMG taken by 12%.
